title: New Jersey Hot Dogs
name: New Jersey Hot Dogs
description:
A Map by Jerry

New Jersey has the best hot dog stands in the country.  That's right.

properties.name: Amazing Hot Dog
properties.description: Posted by Jerry148 bloomfield ave, verona njSometimes I wonder if it\'s a coincidence that I live amongst all these great hot dog places or if, perhaps, without me there wouldn\'t be enough business for a hot dog place. Deep thoughts. Deep-fried, bacon-wrapped beef dogs.

properties.name: Callahan's
properties.description: Posted by Jerry1365 Palisade Ave, fort lee njGreat hot dogs. A must-stop when you\'re roaming Fort Lee, trying to avoid traffic on the way to the GWB.

properties.name: Fall's View Grill
properties.description: Posted by JerryLegend has it that one of these places has a view of a falls. Not this one. My kids love this place, but sometimes I\'m tempted to get a hamburger instead of a hot dog. Enough said.

properties.name: Galloping Hill Inn
properties.description: Posted by JerryÂ 325 chestnut, union njSome say the best in Northern NJ.

properties.name: Goffle Grill
properties.description: Posted by Jerry 1140 Goffle Road, hawthorne, njTexas Wieners, love the onions, used to go here growing up. Not so much anymore.

properties.name: Hot Grill
properties.description: Posted by Jerry669 Lexington Ave, clifton njGreat hot dogs and gravy fries. Not my personal fave, but some people rave about it.

properties.name: Jerry's
properties.description: Posted by Jerry906 2nd Avenue, elizabeth njNo relation. Sometimes I\'m driving around the vicinity of Newark Airport, trying to remember how to get on the Pulaski Skyway so I can take the back way to Hoboken and I end up in Elizabeth. I doubt I could find this place if I was actually looking for it. Wish I could.

properties.name: Jimmy Buff's
properties.description: Posted by Jerry60 washington st., west orange njMy favorite hot dog place, also favorite of my son. "Italian" style hot dogs.

properties.name: Johnny & Hanges
properties.description: Posted by Jerry23-20 maple ave, fairlawn njGreat chile dogs. Used to go to J&H with my dad when they were across the river in Paterson.

properties.name: Rutt's Hut
properties.description: Posted by Jerry417 River Road, Clifton, NJ, 07014Amazing "rippers": boiled then fried hot dogs. Ambience that has resisted the surrounding suburban gentrification, to boot.

properties.name: Syd's Hot Dogs
properties.description: Posted by Jerry2933 Vauxhill Road, union njFoot long, all beef, charbroiled. The antidote to the Short Hills Mall.
